detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DFGL (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFGL.sol#84-201) has payable functions:
	 - DFGL.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFGL.sol#190-192)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
